channel.title: Direct X runtime installation problems
channel.description:
Trying to install direct x sdk, got s1023 error, installed direct x runtime, got internal system error, checked the dxerror.log, [noparse]
-------------------- [09/17/11 00:52:46] module: dxupdate(Mar 5 2008), file: dxupdate.cpp, line: 6484, function: CMDXCheck::IsAssemblyInUse
GetAssemblyList() failed, error = 0x80070005.
-------------------- [09/17/11 00:52:46] module: dxupdate(Mar 5 2008), file: dxupdate.cpp, line: 6484, function: CMDXCheck::IsAssemblyInUse
GetAssemblyList() failed, error = 0x80070005.
-------------------- [09/17/11 00:52:46] module: dxupdate(Mar 5 2008), file: dxupdate.cpp, line: 6484, function: CMDXCheck::IsAssemblyInUse
GetAssemblyList() failed, error = 0x80070005.
-------------------- [09/17/11 00:52:46] module: dxupdate(Mar 5 2008), file: dxupdate.cpp, line: 6484, function: CMDXCheck::IsAssemblyInUse
GetAssemblyList() failed, error = 0x80070005.
-------------------- [09/17/11 00:52:46] module: dxupdate(Mar 5 2008), file: dxupdate.cpp, line: 6484, function: CMDXCheck::IsAssemblyInUse
GetAssemblyList() failed, error = 0x80070005.
-------------------- [09/17/11 00:52:46] module: dxupdate(Mar 5 2008), file: dxupdate.cpp, line: 6484, function: CMDXCheck::IsAssemblyInUse
GetAssemblyList() failed, error = 0x80070005.
-------------------- [09/17/11 00:52:46] module: dxupdate(Mar 5 2008), file: dxupdate.cpp, line: 6484, function: CMDXCheck::IsAssemblyInUse
GetAssemblyList() failed, error = 0x80070005.
-------------------- [09/17/11 00:52:46] module: dxupdate(Mar 5 2008), file: dxupdate.cpp, line: 6484, function: CMDXCheck::IsAssemblyInUse [noparse] GetAssemblyList() failed, error = 0x80070005.
-------------------- [09/17/11 00:52:46] module: dxupdate(Mar 5 2008), file: dxupdate.cpp, line: 6484, function: CMDXCheck::IsAssemblyInUse
GetAssemblyList() failed, error = 0x80070005.
-------------------- [09/17/11 00:52:46] module: dsetup32(Mar 5 2008), file: dxupdate.cpp, line: 280, function: CSetup::InstallPlugIn
DirectXUpdateInstallPlugIn() failed. [/noparse]
Have any clue what's wrong?

item.title: Direct X runtime installation problems
item.dc:creator: calhoun_freeman
item.description:
I know I’ll get fucking kicked in the ass for this, but this is pretty damn important for me. I know I should post this in the microsoft forums, but THAT PLACE IS NOT USER FRIENDLY AT ALL, AND I CAN’T FIND WHERE TO POST IT.

Read full topic

item.title: Direct X runtime installation problems
item.dc:creator: calhoun_freeman
item.description:
Updating my drivers was one of the things I did to fix it. EVERY DAMN VERSION OF DXWEBINSTALLER AND DXREDIST AND SDK DOES NOT WORK.

dxdiag

Read full topic

Trying to install direct x sdk, got s1023 error, installed direct x runtime, got internal system error, checked the dxerror.log,

[09/17/11 00:52:46] module: dxupdate(Mar 5 2008), file: dxupdate.cpp, line: 6484, function: CMDXCheck::IsAssemblyInUse

are you trying to install DirectX on Linux?

if not, try to get a newer version of the directx web installer/redistributable

item.title: Direct X runtime installation problems
item.dc:creator: Drew
item.description:
Have you updated your drivers recently? If not do so. Maybe you could use a re-install or it might repair them. Maybe it will reset or close out of any stuck/broken DirectX programs…
Also try and run this too. https://www.microsoft.com/download/en/details.aspx?id=35

One more thing… Have you restarted your computer recently? lol

Read full topic
